Articles.Content:
I just found this Introduction thread, so I thought I'd introduce myself since i'm new here.

So hi, my name is thatBeatsguy. I've been playing Kerbal Space Program since around 0.23.5, so I came in pretty late to the party. It's been a wild ride, though, and I haven't stopped playing the game since I got it.

So yeah, that's about it. God, I'm so bad at this.
Welcome aboard! And don't ever think that an intro thread is bad! There are plenty that don't say much at all, so technically yours is pretty advanced.

You're not bad! I love your intro!

Welcome to the KSP Forums & Community!
Welcome to the forums! Glad to have you with us.
